Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.4 Ariyamaggavagga
4.4.2 Kaṇhamaggasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Ariyamaggavagga
Kaṇhamaggasutta
190.
1358“Kaṇhamaggañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sukkamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, kaṇho maggo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kaṇho maggo.
1359Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sukko maggo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukko maggo”ti.
1360Dutiyaṃ.
<< 4.4.1 Ariyamaggasuttaup4.4.3 Saddhammasutta >>
